create source sensor_readings(
    sensor_id big int,
    location varchar,
    temperature double,
    primary key (sensor_id)
);
Ok
create materialized view wincanton_readings
    select sensor_id, location, temperature
    from test.sensor_readings
    where location='wincanton';
Ok
select * from test.sensor_readings order by sensor_id;
|3|"san francisco"|29.400000|
|2|"london"|27.600000|
|4|"sydney"|35.700000|
|1|"wincanton"|23.200000|
4 rows returned
select * from test.wincanton_readings;
0 rows returned
